plot outline: Betti 24 is toying with the idea of cheating on her boyfriend Sascha 25. Betti wants to be selfish and to sleep with another man, a wish, which is hard to admit to herself. When it finally happens it turns out to be not as fulfilling as she had expected. Turning back to Sascha, who is now the one questioning their relationship, Betti must fear for his love.
title: At Once
plot: Sasha and Betti, a falling out of love story told in two chapters.

Betti 24 is toying with the idea of cheating on her boyfriend Sascha 25. Betti wants to be selfish and to sleep with another man, a wish, which is hard to admit to herself. When it finally happens it turns out to be not as fulfilling as she had expected. Turning back to Sascha, who is now the one questioning their relationship, Betti must fear for his love.::Anonymous
